rows.label: qst104504_msg003
rows.name: Please fetch it for me, mo.

rows.label: qst104504_msg0001
rows.name:
The preparations for the merchandise
are perfect now! Thank you, mo!

rows.label: qst104504_msg0002
rows.name:
...But, I have one more
favor to ask, mo.

rows.label: qst104504_msg0003
rows.name:
I think the current products will
sell reasonably well, but...

rows.label: qst104504_msg0004
rows.name:
...we're lacking a product
that will really make them
think, "This is it!", mo.

rows.label: qst104504_msg0005
rows.name:
So, I want to collect the Metal Brooches
that are popular among the soldiers and
make them our main attraction, mo!

rows.label: qst104504_msg0006
rows.name:
Kukn has never heard of a
treasure with such a name, mo.

rows.label: qst104504_msg0007
rows.name:
Even when I asked the soldiers, they
said it was too dangerous for a Nopon
to get and wouldn't tell me...mo...

rows.label: qst104504_msg0008
rows.name:
I need you to get the info from the
soldiers and collect them. 10 should
be plenty, mo. Please, mo~!
